= ChainedScope

== Prerequirements
* ActiveRecord >= 2.1.2 or higher

== Description
make specified named_scope to method chain-able.

== Example
You can rewrite

  models = Model.all
  models = Model.an_scope(params[:key1]) unless params[:key1]
  models = Model.another_scope(params[:key2]) unless params[:key2]
  ...

to

 class Model < ActiveRecord::Base
   named_scope :an_scope, ...
   named_scope :another_scope, ...

   chainable_scope :an_scope, :another_scope
 end

 models = Model.all.
            an_scope(params[:key1]).
            another_scope(params[:key2])
 ...
